Chapter 2 Small simulation 2.1 Simulating a sample from a standard normal with rnorm.

Chapter 2 Small simulation 2.1 Simulating a sample from a standard normal with rnorm. Simulating a sample of size 1000 from a standard normal distribution with \(\mu = 0\) and \(\sigma = 1\). x <- rnorm(1000, 0, 1) Plotting a hostogram of the sample and labeling the plot. hist(x, col = "yellow", main = "Histogram of a sample from a standard normal") Figure 2.1: Here is a simple plot!
